name: Dirt Ski Racer - 3D Dirt Bike Ski Racer For Kids
name_original: Dirt Ski Racer - 3D Dirt Bike Ski Racer For Kids
description:
One of the Most addictive racing game on AppStore!

Get ready for our new desert skiing journey game referred to as DIRT SKI RACER. Here in this game you will be tested and we tend to challenge your skiing skills and check them to the easy lay with this Offroad Skiing Trip.

Race against opponents and destroy them,Boost up your speed like no one else can! Get ready for the drive of your life!

Features:
* Beautiful Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
* Smooth And Easy Game Play
* Environments That Keeps Changing
* Real Life Animations And Physics
